argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | asclinvg.a | |- A = ( algSc ` W ) |
| 2 |  | asclinvg.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 3 |  | asclinvg.k | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | asclinvg.i | |- I = ( invg ` R ) |
| 5 |  | asclinvg.j | |- J = ( invg ` W ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ W e. Ring /\ C e. B ) -> W e. Ring ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ W e. Ring /\ C e. B ) -> W e. LMod ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 6, 7 | #P_asclghm | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ W e. Ring /\ C e. B ) -> A e. ( R GrpHom W ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ W e. Ring /\ C e. B ) -> C e. B ) |
| 10 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_ghminv | |- ( ( A e. ( R GrpHom W ) /\ C e. B ) -> ( A ` ( I ` C ) ) = ( J ` ( A ` C ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( A e. ( R GrpHom W ) /\ C e. B ) -> ( J ` ( A ` C ) ) = ( A ` ( I ` C ) ) ) |
| 12 | 8, 9, 11 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ W e. Ring /\ C e. B ) -> ( J ` ( A ` C ) ) = ( A ` ( I ` C ) ) ) |
